reviews.review:
i've played this game for hundreds of hours on ps4 previously, i can safely say the pc version is a lot better especially queue wise. sure this game may have a lot of bugs but its still extremely fun to play, especially with friends (sorry for being 'toxic' swf sometimes)... i followed this game before it was released on ps4 from watching streamers and i knew it would be a game i really enjoy. the best addition to this game is the demogorgon, he is my favourite killer to play against and he is just very cute. 

a lot of people would rate this game negatively just because of the bugs and sometimes it can be pretty toxic from both sides but it is still overall a fun game to play, just like any game it will have its bad days and then days where its a super enjoyable experience. it is one of my favourite games of all time and regardless of the community being toxic at times i've met some really nice and wholesome people through the game. dbd can be kind of grindy at times but only if you want to get your survivors and killers to prestige 3 level 50 with max perks but thats mainly for people who play a lot (like me).

i will still probably play this game for a long time and i can't wait for more dlc's to come out as there have been so many great ones so far. they slowly fix bugs over time and i think the devs genuinely care a lot about this game so it's definitely worth a try if you're interested in games like this. the bugs can be frustrating at times but like 99% of games they are never perfect but i'd still highly recommend this game <3
if you buy this game expect to play with people 11 or more ranks higher than you with no chance of winning unless you play dirty
Gameplay divertida se jogando em call!
The rush of getting hunted and being the hunter is pretty noice. Matchmaking is a bit longer than some other games. Overall pretty fun.

This game after last update is complete garbage, playing as a killer is no more fun. All u can do is just wait until survs will done gens in 5 minutes and then escape with dead hard, DS, and recently buffed Boil over with 7 second escape.
And of course MMR system. It's completely unfun for new players especially, and players that just want to have fun. You lose - you do a 4K and next match u just suck and lose all gens in 5 or less minutes, in the same time playing with guys that have 2k hours or more. This cycle will continue all the time until u get bored and start to understand how poor this system is.
Survivors are very much OP, it's not interesting to win a match if u are just a little bit experienced or have perks that will carry you. Even a killer that played 2k hours won't win a 700 hours survivor just because this game is very, and I repeat: VERY survivor sided.
e massa pena q n da pra matar amigo

As fun as this game is with friends, it gets very repetitive and old very fast.  

The concept of either being a killer chasing 4 other people, or being a survivor running from the killer, is a great concept.  I just wish it had more to it than the same game mode, same pallets reused everywhere, and the maps looking like they have the same layout but different textures.  The game always seems to run into some serious problems that always sets me off for long periods of time from playing, until one of my friends tells me to try it again its "fixed"

Overall, its not a bad game, but I really want to see some new game modes, or something DIFFERENT than the same formula being redone over and over again.

The game and the idea around it is pretty interesting and enjoyable(on paper). However the balance just always seems off and the developers' changes on the state of the game only range around making it slightly better or the updates are way off the mark. Just this week the flavour of the game is you go up against rank 1 killers only.

There are many weeks with different flavours of wanky stuff going on.Weird updates to mechanics/matchmaking/items/dlcs and also bugs.Most of the time frustrating stuff,sadly.
 
One of the results of this is that the game is not new player friendly. 
It's also a game more focused on winning than having fun. If the killer is a dick and camps people you are supposed to let them die and do gens to win the round and the person on the hook has to suck it up. He has to somehow get his fun from the fact that the killer lost this round cause he camped him and ruined his game. 
There are many issues like this and they will never get addressed by the developers or by the community in some extent. 
Issues that you are supposed to turn the blind eye,sacrifices on the great altar of "winning". 
I just want to have fun and this game makes it hard for me.Haven't even addressed keys and moris and just ruining someone's game cause "wow i got this -super rare thing supposedly- and im entitled to mess someone's day up and drain fun from even more lobbies." The community is also pretty toxic in this dumb two side trench battlefield "survivor mains" and "killer mains" gauging each others eyes out daily.

You will love this game before you hate it but you definitely will hate it at some point.If you push through till you find fun again in playing it,good for you,honestly. I however just can't recommend it and the only reason i'm still around playing it is because of all the friends i've made and it's only slightly fun this way.
Because a game is worth playing only if you're having fun with it.

Thanks for reading.
Gostei muito. Acho muito competitivo e balanceado
Das spiel ist geil nur zu viele camper killer
It s a good game sometimes I experienced bugs but it´s ok and btw is hard to find a killer match
Покупай Майерса,бубу и доктора и нагибай по дикому.

This is by far my favorite game. I have put numerous hours in on both of my accounts and I just love the atmosphere. It may also be because I am pretty decent at both survivor and killer, but in all, I really do enjoy every little bit of this game. i recommend this to anyone who wants a solid survival game that altruistically based. It is also fun for people who like to go around being a murderous killer for the day. Haha. But in all honesty, this is by far one of my favorite games ever and I think that if anyone is considering buying it, it will be worth your time.
The game will get better the more you play, it won't be as fun in the beginning as it will be later in the game (progression wise)
Positive review is not available in your region.
My wife has left me in response to me playing this.
溜屠撞墙，反向盖板.一窗死绕，当面救人.有夹踩夹，有电触电.麦叔狂吸，不知躲避.一刀就倒，就是不跑.门前疯转，治疗嘲讽.大门通电，就是不开.1人上钩，3人去救.无人修机，疯狂白给.赛后嘴臭，互相问候

Just buy it! Had the game for a while, wasn't a fan at first, but once you get past the learning curve (sorta steep and punishing) the game really begins to shine. It's especially fun to play survivor with friends(not so fun alone). But killer is also very fun alone so there's best of both. DLC's are fair and they are constantly working on new progression in game to not make it stale. Hope this review helps make up your mind! :D

Игра - тупое г0вно , тупого г0вна.  есть три варианта этой игры:
1) либо ты собираешь фулл тиму в дискорде и унижаешь маньяка 
2) либо  ты играешь в соло, и маньяк унижает тебя  (ведь  в этой игре нет никакой связи с другими игроками)
3) ты сам играешь за маньяка,  и тут уже твоя удача сыграет роль попадется тебе команда (1) или (2)
O jogo é maravilhoso, devo ter umas 10 ou mais horas no console, pena que não roda no meu pc
very confusing at first i admit but cool game

The game mechanically is very simply but there's still a large skill ceiling. There's literally like 3 buttons + movement and 3 things that are interactable, but the difference between a good and bad player is very apparent. It's all about getting a hang of the movement, become familiar with the survivors, villains, perks, and maps. The game makes for some really exciting moments and if you play with friends as survivors you can have some really satisfying moments if you coordinate well.

My biggest complaint is you can't really communicate with teammates in-game, but everyone uses discord, so if you are playing with randoms you're at a huge disadvantage. The game is clearly balanced with communications in mind.

It would also be nice if there were ways to get some more survivors+villains without spending money. For the main reason that facing villains, 95% of the time it will be one of the free starting 5.
нет аналогов, при этом игра захватывает не только процессом, но и историей
GG WP, мансеры даун, кемперы шлюхи!

С каждым патчем всё больше и больше багов,которые мешают играть и портят геймплей.Например с каждым обновлением маньяки могут бьют через окна всё дальше и дальше,так же хитбокс у топоров охотницы всё больше и больше.А так игра хорошая
Это хорошая игра, я её рекомендую но она для средних пк так што, некоторые компютеры могут не потдерживать
Um belo jogo, não é muito pesado, pessoas que normalmente tem medo de jogos de terror conseguem jogar ele tranquilamente,mas ainda tem experiencias perfeitas!

Ce jeu a dû avoir une belle vie à une époque, mais c'est révolu. Plus de 15 minutes pour trouver une partie, et se retrouver soit avec un hacker, soit avec un laggueur. Parce que oui, le tueur étant l'hôte de la partie, vous avez plus à craindre de sa connexion en 56k que de son couteau ; qui vous touchera quoi qu'il arrive... Les tueurs sont trop fort, mais tenables avec une équipes soudés. Sauf quand ils décident d'utiliser les accessoires ultra-rare. La partie est perdu d'avance pour les survivants. Les skills ne se valent pas et vous reviendrez inlassablement aux 4 mêmes sans lesquels vous ne pourrez vous enfuir arrivé à un certain niveau.

Le jeu n'est pas gratuit, vous mettrez des dizaines d'heures avant de pouvoir acheter un nouveau perso avec l'une des monnaies du jeu.

Optimiser avec les pieds, il crash sans raison, ou alors lorsque l'anti-cheat déconne. Un vrai plaisir...

Bref, je ne recommande pas.

鬼側が完全にボランティアになっています。
実力が同じ場合、基本的に生存者が有利なため、生存者の煽りが横行してます。
それに腹を立て、腹癒せに死体切りでもしようものなら、通報され、いずれはBANされるでしょう。

鬼が居ないと遊べないゲームなのに、鬼をナーフし、マッチング時間が遅くなりました。

周りでやっていた友人がそれをきっかけに一気にやらなくなりました。
配信している人も一気に減り、このゲームは終焉を迎えました。

左クリックを長押しするのが好きな人にはおすすめかもしれません。
说实话，虽然只玩了不到三百个小时，但就在这段时间内，人类被一削再削，各种削弱，屠夫无限加强，也只有开黑的时候有点乐趣了

I had this game for a while now but never played it until a few weeks ago.

I have to admit the game is very fun with friends around, no matter if you annoy them as the Killer in a custom game or play with 3 others a few ranked rounds.
Absoulutely adore this game. At first I had a horrible time finding games until they dropped crossplatform. 10/10 love slapping console players

头一次啊，头一次，能让我发自内心喜欢的游戏感到恶心，厌烦，不想玩，制作组真是人才，先是电锯暗改，拉锯声音稀稀拉拉，手感稀稀拉拉，收锯动画的视角跟摔一跟头一样，转向被砍一刀，撞墙硬长，你要是说这都是BUG还说得过去，可以修复，要是你TM这是暗改，那我也真是想问候制作组全家了，好游戏改成狗屎


在，什么时候把电锯改回来？

I love this game. It is a fun game at low ranks, high ranks are annoying however with any mistake destroying you. Do not grab this game if you do not want to put in the time to get better. The community is also toxic as hell but it is fun to troll the most toxic of them.
买bug送游（手动滑稽）,萌新不要急,慢慢上手了你会体验到真正的乐趣
This game is so good for rage.

一开始知道这个游戏是因为第五人格的大火。
说实话我还是更喜欢第五人格的人偶画风，像黎明杀机这种写实的画风，总是让我感觉自己是在玩恐怖游戏。
不过黎明杀机的内容更加丰富，相比第五人格更加注重玩家的游戏体验。我也才刚刚玩黎明杀机不久，说实话这个坑填的太晚了，毕竟也有许多不可抗因素嘛。
接下来我也要认真对待这款经典游戏，多了解游戏的小技巧和冷知识，努力练习，争取早日成为人皇!
Игра стала заметно лучше,мне очень понравились изменения

At the state the game is in right now, it is literally unplayable at times. The balancing system is garbage, dedicated servers ruin chases and games, the ranking system is all over the place and the map design is complete and utter shit. BUT and this is a big but, these things happen only about 50-60 percent of the time. when this game works as intended i could probably say its one of the most fun games i have ever played, every killer has a unique and different power from the other and you can play it in many different fun styles. all it takes is to fix these problems and this game could be perfect, now obviously implementing these into the game is hard work especially with everything that going on in the world right now. we know the devs are working hard to make this game good and fun, but i think they are tackling the problem from the wrong angle, they fix things that don't need to be fixed. all in all this game is good and it could be amazing with just a little bit more work.

jogo muito bom, se você quer jogar um jogo com seus  vilões favoritos de filmes, series e franquias de games de terror, Dead By Daylight é o jogo perfeito para isso, mas como todos os outro tem seus problemas, a empresa parece que não liga muito para os sobreviventes, eu sou man killer nesse jogo, porem você tem que conhecer os dois lados da moeda, e é realmente vergonhoso, uma visão mais geral da situação é que o killer pode acabar com a partida quando quiser, simplesmente deixando os sobreviventes no chão ou camperando no gancho, eu sei disso que e falo ja que eu testei isso, e em quase todas as partidas tem alguém Toxico. Porem é um bom jogo apesar de tudo, va para esse game com essa intenção, de se divertir o máximo possível e não fique triste quando for jogar de sobrevivente, uma hora vai ter uma partida divertida, a e jogue com os amigos.

descartando toda a review de antes, FINALMENTE EU POSSO FALA DESSE JOGO CERTO.
por onde começar? a, a gameplay, cara, ela é muito boa, porém, as vezes o lag de servidor bate meio forte, mai tirando isso a gameplay se sai muito bem, o sistema das skill checks num tem só nome não, tu tem q te um timing do krl p presta atenção na tua volta e na skill check ao memo tempo, o que não é meu caso, eu tenho mais de 20hr nesse jogo e eu ainda sofro pra faze 3 coisa ao memo tempo, mai ok
os graficos do jogo são bonitos :)... é isso num tem nada de especial, tipo, num é um quadro de da vincci, mai são, descentes?eu acho, eu não jogo o jogo no ultra, 1-meu pc n roda mt bem 2-tem menos detalhe na tela, então eu vejo melhor, é isso
eu ainda mantenho a minha opinião de que DbD é um jogo de terror fraco, mai um otimo multiplayer, um bom terrir tbm, ja q se tu joga cm amigos tu quebra em certas partes, tirando algumas falinhas aqui e ali, como uma otimização meio, meh, e um balanceamento LINDO em algums killers expecificos, que até q da pra releva, o jogo é muito bom, se tu que um jogo p joga cm amigos, esse é perfeito
só não joga de madruga, que de madrugada é a hora do medo... tem muito pro player e troll nessas hora... dale
8.5/10 tem suas falhas, mai vale muito a pena
Great game to have your heart race.

плюсы: 
1) атмосферная оригинальная игра. 
2) адекватная система доната 
3) много интересных уникальных персонажей и перков. 
минусы: 
1) Многие перки бесполезны или малополезны и только занимают место 
2) нет нерейтинговой игры, а ранкед поднимается довольно быстро + абузеры сидят на лоу ранках и периодически издеваются над новичками 
3) комьюнити очень злобное и любит кидать репорты направо налево.

- Поиграл еще 150 часов с тех пор и могу добавить:
Система рейтинга полнейшее, редкостнейшее *овнище!
- Всего 20 рангов, и если игра ищется дольше 90 сек, то спокойнок к 16ым рангам закидывает 4ых, иногда против тебя 16го будет полная команда из 8ых например, это полный п***ец, от игры получаешь не удовольствие, а е***ый подгоревший пукан с того что тупо тратишь свое время впустую и не можешь никому ниче сделать, а эти *ленососы еще угорают над тобой и дразнят вдобавок.

В общем в ситуации с рейтинговой системой DBD есть три варианта
1) Стать Буддой и отрешиться от всего
2) Попасть в дурку или заработать инфаркт
3) Удалить на*** это е**ное *овнище и никогда не донатить в убийство своих нервных клеток
